text: Guy Parmelin (born 9 November 1959) is a Swiss politician. He has been a Member of the Swiss Federal Council since 2016. He was the President of the Swiss Confederation in 2021. He is a member of the Swiss People's Party. == References == Category:1959 births Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:Living people Category:People from Vaud
title: Guy Parmelin
